alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Crittenden; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 1:21PM EST until December 09 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Crittenden County in western Kentucky... North central Caldwell County in western Kentucky... Webster County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 100 PM CST. * At 1221 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Creswell, or near Marion, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Providence, Sebree, Clay, Dixon, Slaughters, and Wheatcroft. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 128 and 137. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for western and northwestern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for western and northwestern Kentucky.
